extendedInfo.description: Get this app for free! At ConstructionKnowledge.net, our resource for learning about construction, sign up for the newsletter or like us on Facebook. Then shoot us an email so we can refund your purchase.Converting Units for Construction:Contains the most commonly used construction units (English and metric) including:length, area, volume, density, mass, pressure, speed, acceleration, energy and power& a decimal feet to feet & inches converter.Contains tables of helpful information:Common densities of aluminum, brick, concrete, fresh snow, etcEnergy of common fuels like gasoline, ethanol, propane, natural gas, coal and wood;Rules of thumb for power including hints like one ton of air conditioning equals 12,000 Btu/hour, a person in a room adds about 250 Btu/hour and a Ford Pinto is 88 HP and uses 2 gallons of gas an hour.ConstructionKnowledge.net:These apps our part of our mission at ConstructionKnowledge.net to help those in construction to learn and rise in this crazy world of construction. Please send us your ideas for apps, suggestions for new web content and follow our blog. It's Ned's fun and informative take on the construction industry.

reviews.comment: Excellent app to use in the field. Has just the reasonable units, not lots I\'d never use. Inches to decimal feet also helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: All of the conversion options you need in the construction business. Quick results. Easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User
